comments:
Just a head up. The following NPE is thrown frequnetly, although it doesn't seem
to has obvious effect.

The debugging shows that field fServer is often null.


------- code -------
	public boolean validate() {
		fServer.setServerInstanceProperties(getValues());
		return false;
	}
